Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds significant value for us and has been meticulously designed to cater to your needs. Considering its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer reflects our commitment to providing quality products while also considering your perceived value of the item. We trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We hope to hear back from you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
